variant.name: Fuel after engine start
variant.description: During engine start-up, the inner wing tank is used

variant.description: During taxi, the center fuel tank is used

variant.name: Fuel in inner tank after take-off
variant.description: During take-off, the inner fuel tank is used, as it is prohibited to use the center tanke

variant.name: Empty center tank
variant.description: During flight, the center tank is used until it is empty

variant.description: All fuel used from the inner tank

variant.name: Empty inner tank
variant.description: All fuel used from the inner tank
